publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1106 Ian Jenkins: Sydney 2000 and European Cup Athletics-That the Parliament congratulates all the Scottish athletes who contributed to remarkable British successes at the European cup at Gateshead; welcomes the progress made by the Scottish Executive in developing community sports facilities, and wishes the Great Britain team well in the forthcoming Sydney Olympic Games.

S1M-1106 Ian Jenkins: Sydney 2000 and European Cup Athletics-That the Parliament congratulates all the Scottish athletes who contributed to remarkable British successes at the European cup at Gateshead; welcomes the progress made by the Scottish Executive in developing community sports facilities, and wishes the Great Britain team well in the forthcoming Sydney Olympic Games.
S1M-1106 Sydney 2000 and European Cup Athletics (lodged on 17 July 2000) Donald Gorrie*

S1M-1106 Ian Jenkins: Sydney 2000 and European Cup Athletics-That the Parliament congratulates all the Scottish athletes who contributed to remarkable British successes at the European cup at Gateshead; welcomes the progress made by the Scottish Executive in developing community sports facilities, and wishes the Great Britain team well in the forthcoming Sydney Olympic Games. Supported by: Donald Gorrie

S1M-1106 Ian Jenkins: Sydney 2000 and European Cup Athletics-That the Parliament congratulates all the Scottish athletes who contributed to remarkable British successes at the European cup at Gateshead; welcomes the progress made by the Scottish Executive in developing community sports facilities, and wishes the Great Britain team well in the forthcoming Sydney Olympic Games. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S1M-1106 Sydney 2000 and European Cup Athletics (lodged on 17 July 2000) Mr Brian Monteith*

S1M-1106 Ian Jenkins: Sydney 2000 and European Cup Athletics—That the Parliament congratulates all the Scottish athletes who contributed to remarkable British successes at the European cup at Gateshead; welcomes the progress made by the Scottish Executive in developing community sports facilities, and wishes the Great Britain team well in the forthcoming Sydney Olympic Games. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Mr Brian Monteith

S1M-1106 Ian Jenkins: Sydney 2000 and European Cup Athletics—That the Parliament congratulates all the Scottish athletes who contributed to remarkable British successes at the European cup at Gateshead; welcomes the progress made by the Scottish Executive in developing community sports facilities, and wishes the Great Britain team well in the forthcoming Sydney Olympic Games. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Mr Brian Monteith

Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Mr Brian Monteith

Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Mr Brian Monteith

S1M-1106 Ian Jenkins: Sydney 2000 and European Cup Athletics—That the Parliament congratulates all the Scottish athletes who contributed to remarkable British successes at the European cup at Gateshead; welcomes the progress made by the Scottish Executive in developing community sports facilities, and wishes the Great Britain team well in the forthcoming Sydney Olympic Games. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Mr Brian Monteith
